presentationColumns.name: Calendar Date
presentationColumns.description:
Calendar Date uniquely identifies each record in the Time dimension table. 
Stores the date information in the format MM/DD/YYYY.  Eg :- 11/12/2006

presentationColumns.name: Per Name Week
presentationColumns.description: Per Name Week- Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Number. Eg :- 2005 Week 44

presentationColumns.name: Per Name Month
presentationColumns.description: Per Name Month. Stores the month information in the format YYYY / MM. Eg :- 2006 / 11

presentationColumns.name: Per Name Qtr
presentationColumns.description: Per Name Qtr. Stores the Quarter information in the format YYYY QQuarterNumber. Eg :- 2005 Q3

presentationColumns.name: Per Name Half
presentationColumns.description: Per Name Half. Stores the Half year information in the format YYYY HYHalfYearNumber. Eg :- 2006 HY2

presentationColumns.name: Per Name Year
presentationColumns.description: Per Name Year. Stores the year information in the format YYYY. Eg :- 2006
